channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ultimate Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ultimate Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-6362|2024-07-29T06:00:07.759Z -- unknown -- ultimate%20blocks
item.description: The Ultimate Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.2.0 does not validate and escape some of its post-grid block attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-4655|2024-07-11T06:00:02.913Z -- unknown -- ultimate%20blocks
item.description: The Ultimate Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.1.9 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-3241|2024-06-04T17:31:59.787Z -- unknown -- ultimate%20blocks
item.description: The Ultimate Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.1.7 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.description: The Ultimate Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.1.9 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
